item.title: Learning and Action
item.description: Being a reader comes naturally to some of us, and Iâ€™m glad to count myself in that number. Over the years, however, the ways I read have changed, and the purposes for reading with them. Recently I've run into a number of readers who illustrate the ways in which I read (or used to read).

item.title: Arch of Titus: Rome and the Menorah
item.description:
Arch of Titus: Rome and the Menorah

There is much that is good about this course, and that is where my review will focus; as an employee of Onlea, I take courses like this to improve my own craft, not to put others down.
